directions: Top with remaining ingredients; roll up.
ingredients: 1/2 (8 ounce) tub PHILADELPHIA Spicy Jalapeno Cream Cheese Spread
8 slices OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Smoked Turkey Breast
4 slices OSCAR MAYER Bacon, cooked, drained
1/2 red pepper, sliced into thin strips
title: Kickin' Turkey Club Wrap
